trees.panel.style.sizes

Class Fixed

  • java.lang.Object
    • trees.panel.style.Size
      • trees.panel.style.sizes.Fixed

  • public class Fixed
extends Size
    Fixed size with the same upper and lower bounds. The nodes with this size will have all equal sizes. When choosing this size type, the node label is adjusted to the size (and not vice versa).
    Author:
    Marcus Deininger

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Fixed(int width, int height)
      Setting the (upper and lower) bounds of the size to the given parameters.

      Checks if the size has upper bounds.

      Checks if the size is fixed.

      • Fixed

        public Fixed(int width,
     int height)
        Setting the (upper and lower) bounds of the size to the given parameters. For convenience you may use the factory method of Size instead
        Parameters:
        width - Width of the node (in pixels).
        height - height of the node (in pixels).
